original_text: Then Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard carried away captive certain of the poor of the people, and the residue of the people that remained in the city, and those that fell away, that fell to the king of Babylon, and the rest of the multitude.
korean_text: 사령관 느부사라단이 백성 중 가난한 자와 성중에 남아 있는 백성과 바벨론 왕에게 항복한 자와 무리의 남은 자를 사로잡아 갔고

sentences.original_text: Then Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard
certain of the poor of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 백성 중 가난한 자들 중 일부를

sentences.original_text: and the residue of the people
that fell to the king of Babylon
and the rest of the multitude
